mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userForm (userEmail, fileName, armSize, shoulderSize, bodySize, legSize) VALUES (#{userEmail}, #{fileName}, #{armSize}, #{shoulderSize}, #{bodySize}, #{legSize}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE fileName = VALUES(fileName), armSize = VALUES(armSize), shoulderSize = VALUES(shoulderSize), bodySize = VALUES(bodySize), legSize = VALUES(legSize)
mapper.select: SELECT fileName FROM userForm WHERE userEmail = #{userEmail}
